Text: Thank you :D I wish there was a way to tell immediately if there was a 1080p version coming out as well.
Me too. Also any chance when you upload 1080p you could make it DD5.1? The AAC2.0 is mediocre and isn't really a great match with the excellent video quality.
1080p is impossible until it gets out on bluray. AMC-HD broadcasts in 1080i. Good luck finding 1080i releases of tv shows though. Maybe on private torrent sites.
